about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the epic fantasy world of "King of Queendoms" again by listening to its ethereal orchestral soundtrack. Composed by celebrated Swedish producer DJ Twili(kn)ight.

Tracks included

01 - A Mystical Land
02 - A Quiet Night
03 - An Unexpected Day
04 - Trouble Arises
05 - The Pauline Military Academy
06 - Sexy Knight
detailed_description:
Immerse yourself in the epic fantasy world of "King of Queendoms" again by listening to its ethereal orchestral soundtrack. Composed by celebrated Swedish producer DJ Twili(kn)ight.

Tracks included

01 - A Mystical Land
02 - A Quiet Night
03 - An Unexpected Day
04 - Trouble Arises
05 - The Pauline Military Academy
06 - Sexy Knight

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip

name: King of Queendoms Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista or higher
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Vista or higher
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in the epic fantasy world of "King of Queendoms" again by listening to its ethereal orchestral soundtrack. Composed by celebrated Swedish producer DJ Twili(kn)ight.
